headline: Citigroup: Undervalued And Trading At A Discount To Book Value Despite Rallying
summary: Citigroup's shares surged 94% in 2023. Learn about its restructuring, strong growth outlook, and $20B buyback.

headline: Pierer Mobility shares halted after KTM restructuring plan approved
summary: Shares in Pierer Mobility AG were halted from trading on Tuesday after being seen up 16.7% in response to the reorganization plan for the company's subsidiary KTM AG being accepted by creditors. ...
